gdpr_delete.heading: Right to be forgotten
gdpr_delete.manual: <0>We currently do not have the technical setup to facilitate automatic account removal. Please contact <1>{{data_handler}}</1> to delete your account. <2>Note this will delete all your data including your GIFs!</2> This may have unintended consequences for anyone using them.</0>

gdpr_checkout.heading: Right to data portability
gdpr_checkout.manual: <0>We currently do not have the technical setup to facilitate automatic information retrieval. Please contact <1>{{data_handler}}</1> to retrieve your information. Note this process may take a while, as we have to manually gather all the required information.</0>
